intro_only_event_m23_1/4901_1301_0100_10:
Hold on—where are we?!
How in the world did we end up here?!
intro_only_event_m23_1/4901_1301_0200_10: Weren’t we on our way to some sort of jungle...?
intro_only_event_m23_1/4901_1301_0300_10:
Not anymore! We went off track after you two
losers said ya saw a Mythical Pokémon!
intro_only_event_m23_1/4901_1301_0400_10:
That’s right! We saw a Celebi! I think it flew off
toward the forest.
intro_only_event_m23_1/4901_1301_0500_10: Hey! What are you looking at?
intro_only_event_m23_1/4901_1301_0600_10:
We’re about to head into the forest. Don’t even
think about following us!
intro_only_event_m23_1/6001_1031_0100_10:
We’ll catch you, Celebi!
Just you wait!
intro_only_event_m23_1/6001_1301_0200_10:
We’re about to head into the forest. Don’t even
think about following us!
intro_only_event_m23_1/6002_1031_0100_10:
We gotta bring that
Mythical Pokémon to
the boss!
intro_only_event_m23_1/6002_1301_0200_10:
If we catch Celebi, we can get whatever we want
as a reward!
